/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The viewer's perspective is that of a pedestrian standing on the sidewalk, looking down the length of the street. The street itself is lined with lush green trees, their leaves forming a canopy overhead. The buildings on either side of the street are white, their facades adorned with balconies that add a touch of architectural interest. The sky above is a clear blue, and the sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. The image is taken from a low angle, which gives a sense of depth and perspective to the viewer. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky and the white of the buildings.
